name: Echoes of Madness
description:
Surviving is just the beginning.

80 years after the opening of Greenview Psychiatric Hospital, Alex Turner, a private investigator, has been hired as the head of security for the asylum by an anonymous benefactor to investigate the mysteries lurking within the sanatorium. Upon arrival, he discovers that nothing is as it seems; the disappearances and deaths under strange circumstances are just the tip of the iceberg of what's happening there. Thus begins this mysterious and chilling horror story where life and death intertwine.

With innovative gameplay mechanics in this genre, a story that immerses you in the depths of unimaginable horrors, and an immersive visual and auditory setting, Echoes of Madness marks the revival of this forgotten subgenre lost to time.

Plunge into the psychological terror of Greenview.

Monitor the cameras, observe the anomalies, manage the employees of the facility, maintain control over the vital systems of the facility and your own. Will you be able to survive your watch?
